      • process

        protected void process(List<String> keys)
        process publish() event from worker thread. This updates the gui in the sense that a property is added to the TemplateWizard and it is refreshed. This gives a template the opportunity to change the display based on a property (e.g. a checkbox)
        Overrides:
        process in class org.jdesktop.swingworker.SwingWorker<Void,String>
